mapper.select: select d.id id, account, password, d.name name, sex, age, face, education, salary, departmentId, de.name departmentName from t_doctor d left join t_department de on(d.departmentId=de.id) where account=#{account};
mapper.update: update t_doctor set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, face = #{face}, education = #{education} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select e.id id, money, sign, reason, a.name name from t_extra e left join t_admin a on(e.adminId=a.id) where e.doctorId=#{doctorId};
